message.body: Hey man, do you think I could make a few cuts on yr table saw today? Making the redwood bench for woodstock but the portable does not go wide enough.
Not a good time. I'm doing poly today
Would tomorrow or Saturday work? Or Sunday?

I'm working on a lot of stuff til oct. 7th down here. If you are just making a few cuts and your project will leave right after, I can move my stuff out of the way temporarily on Saturday. My fence goes out to 30"
Yeah, it's just 4 long mitre corners that need a fence at 20". I can do Saturday whenever so let me know when works. Thanks.
I got about 40 min worth of sanding to do right now before I poly if u want to do it now. Otherwise, Saturday morning
Sat morning is fine. I just did the glue up so that's gotta dry anyway.
Got the domino XL btw if you ever need to use it. It makes really strong joints.
I'd like to start doing splines on my frames, but I'm going to wait til after this batch to try it out
Nice. When you do it, if you want a hand, I'd like to see how that works.
